Title: Reversible protein carbonylation in-vivo biosensor
Abstract: © 2019 The Authors.We show preliminary results of an optical fiber based reversible in-vivo biosensor for understanding redox balance within living systems. The biosensor measured protein carbonyls (oxygen metabolism marker) in pig-skin, live mouse, and wheat plant.
